channel.title: 317 Pickup glitch
channel.description: On my server whenever i spawn an item i will spawn double the amount of what i wanted. How would i fix that?

item.title: 317 Pickup glitch
item.dc:creator: @TrisidiaX TrisidiaX
item.description:
@TrisidiaX wrote:

:o EASY FIX
Open Commands.java
search for “Item”
now u should see 2 commands that say “item” scence its spawning double of the ammount you want, if your trying to keep this a spwaning server then on the 1st command that says “item” do something like “item” && c.playerRights == 0)) {
or if u dont want reg players to spawn then simply delete the 1st item command under player commands or admin commands

Read full topic
